summary: Replaces the textures of the Bloody Wings to go from the yellow orange to a red.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]W[/size]as not a fan of the yellow orange that bloody wings were, they did not seem bloody and did not match daedric armor at all. I am not very good at texturing.Â Other people with real texture making skills seem to be unable willing to share. This is simply what I ended up with after some trial and error. If people wish to share their version of the textures, I will most likely either replace mine or added it to downloads.
[size=6]F[/size]uture plans? Depending on interest possibly attempt to improve the current texture. Maybe more colors variants?
author: eleteguard
